metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18551 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in drivers/i2c/i2c-core-smbus.c in the Linux kernel before 4.14.15. There is an out of bounds write in the function i2c_smbus_xfer_emulated.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-18551` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-10-generic - 4.15.0-10.11
linux-image-4.15.0-10-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-10.11
